operations teams with deep experience on existing systems and data sources     masters degree mba or equivalent experience in data analytics quantitative analysis or statistics

of groceries from stores they love driving incremental growth and frequency with whole foods and amazon this business analyst will leverage deep dives and metrics to identify key drivers of the candidate will be a general athlete and selfstarter who is comfortable performing complex analysis and working with large data sets heshe can quickly understand the key drivers of our performance across functions as we scale including marketingmerchandising inventory management selection service availability and costs of fulfillment etc identify key differences relative to other prime nowamazon businesses and identify areas for improvement the role will involve a wide range of realworld problemsolving situations and will require the ability to form strong recommendations supported autonomy and thought leadership you will be part of a highfunctioning fastmoving team responsible for delivering on strategic goals with direct impact for our customers          responsibilities offering and make recommendations for new metrics techniques and strategies to improve performance          successful candidates will demonstrate the following     have a passion for sourcing manipulating and visualizing data     present to stakeholders clearly communicating strategic findings and recommendations     translate technical concepts into business terms     work in rapidly independently identify and set priorities in an ambiguous fastmoving environment     basic qualifications     bachelors degree in finance statistics mathematics or related field preferred     24 years dynamic ambiguous environment     excellent interpersonal skills ability to work successfully with functional teams across the organization     ability to display complex quantitative data in a simple intuitive format and to present findings in a clear and concise manner     exceptional attention to detail     enthusiasm for developing new ideas and creative solutions     preferred qualifications     experience utilizing sql and working with large datasets

business analytics team supports the global business on both the amplify brand and agency campaigns as well as engage publisher     this is a unique opportunity to build a career in business analytics working in a dynamic global technology company and gain visibility of your work across all levels of management           for this role we are committed to finding a highly analytical data analysis expert who is passionate about business issues with an ability to communicate findings clearly at any level of the business     this is an opportunity to work on cuttingedge innovative analysis and utilizing data to aid business decisions with business units such as account management sales business development and senior management          responsibilities     working on deeper insights and analysis to help decide next steps and course of action for both amplify and engage customers as well as our business teams     conceptualizing building and automating internal facing dashboards and reports reflecting the performance and activities of the business against its main kpis     working with our international bi teams in new york and israel to share knowledge data insights and best practice     working closely with the account management teams to create and automate clientfacing reports or account reviews          your first year should look like this     in your first month you global payments product in this role you will identify and drive to resolution payments issues impacting customers on a global scale you will work to identify execute and drive projects with internal displays energy and initiative in solving problems will follow all possible avenues to get the job done are proactive     work requires creativity and judgment responsibilities include both routine with internal customers and external partners in a professional manner     preferred qualifications     payments industry experience     proficiency with sql     strong analytical skills with demonstrated problem solving ability     skilled in prioritization makes the right tradeoffs between schedule resources and scope in order to address major risks challenges and obstacles     data driven and can successfully obtain and use data to support arguments     previous experience in which high levels of initiative judgment and tact has been demonstrated     proven ability to operate in high pressure situations and successfully handle multiple priorities and possess a high level of discipline while remaining flexible     candidate should possess superior customer service skills in in microsoft office suite

otherif you have a curious sort of disposition are great at explaining things and can demonstrate the ability to help customers learn how to apply our cloud based software applications then keep reading          grant street group continues to anticipate the growth of its saas model to our public sector clients whether it is tax processing electronic payments or internet bond auctions we have tools to make government work better          we are looking for talented folks who          want to know why things work the way they do     excel at explaining things with the right amount of detail     are capable communicators with the spoken and written word     know how to collaborate within a team environment     are dedicated learners with the ability to use software     our business analysts come from all sorts of academic business or technical backgrounds their common threads strong academic performance great writers and the ability to engage others in meaningful fun and entertaining conversations if this sounds like you then we do want to start talking about your future and ours          our extraordinary company culture is the foundation of our unmatched customer service  just ask our clients we reward teamwork professional excellence and individual responsibility using the best collaboration tools available we offer a technologyrich work environment that makes it possible for us to support onsite and telecommuting positions tailored to the needs of our employees if you are passionate about your work you have entrepreneurial spirit and you want to be on a team of exceptional professionals then this could be the opportunity you are looking for     if our description fits who you are apply today well take it from there to learn more about the various aspects of this role check out our job responsibilities section below          apply now  business analyst remote     business analyst job responsibilities     if you read our business analyst job posting and thought that sounds great but what is this job actually like then keep reading          the core function of our role as business analysts at grant street group is to be a liaison between our developers and our clients and this requires us to wear many different hats          so what do all of these hats really mean     problem solving every day you work to solve complex problems when you analyze a calculation investigate the cause of a bug or propose a new process you are venturing into unfamiliar territory to find a solution our clients and developers rely on your problem solving skills to ensure our software is built and supported effectively     client support when a customer has a question problem or suggestion they come to you you are known as a subject matter expert and our clients rely on that expertise regularly whether the issue is major or minor you know that grant street group takes software as a service literally     prioritization our software is everchanging with that comes the need to prioritize what when and how changes are made since youre working with the software and our clients daily who better to prioritize than you business analysts are constantly asking themselves does this feature need to be completed before a certain time what is the impact of this bug how can other clients benefit from this change we use a ticketing system to track pieces of work such as functionality requests and bug fixes we then prioritize them for developers to work on     technical specifications its your job to convey to the developers what changes need to be made what happens when you click this button what does the page look like how is this file transferred to an external system in this way you are directly affecting the product and our clients experience     testing when a developer completes a change you get to test it out in a beta environment to ensure that its working correctly does the new behavior match the specification does everything else surrounding the change still work correctly     implementations were a growing company and adding new clients is an exciting part of that growth since youre a subject matter expert you coordinate with new clients to configure the software to best fit their needs think of yourself as a consultant what business processes does the client need to accomplish how can our software fit in with and help that process     training helping clients learn about how our software works is also part of your role whether its a new client coming up to speed on how tasks are completed or an existing client that is incorporating a new feature into their process youre a resource for providing the information and tools they need     does this sound exciting and overwhelming at the same time most of us thought so too if you havent had experience in this area before know that many of us lacked business analyst experience before we came to grant street group what we did have was intellectual curiosity and a passion for problem solving if youve already had business analyst experience thats great and were excited about the possibility of you continuing on that path with us     so now that you know what we do why are you a great fit youve probably spent a large majority of your life asking why and then making sure that you figure out the answer you love using all parts of your brain equally and the thought of speaking with a client or learning about a database schema equally intrigues you youre the one that people rely on in team projects youre always itching to know more and you hold yourself and others to a high standard     before you begin the interview process keep in mind that we have a tendency to pay special attention to those that put in extra effort in their applications we are radical proponents of the belief that you are more than just a resume if youre excited about this opportunity we cant wait to get to know you

wps offers the excitement opportunity energy agility and collaborative spirit of a startup within a stable familyowned company thats been around and thriving for over 69 years we publish educational and psychological assessments that allow helping professionals to accurately screen diagnose and treat people in need a great opportunity to grow your skills and feel good about what you do at work          this is a fulltime position in las breezy south bay and local candidates are preferred wps offers a competitive salary doe and benefits including paid time off medical dental 401k and retirement plan we work hard and take care of business while mindful of the value of worklife balance onsite car wash weekly meditation exercise boot camp a lunch lottery mentorship program and quarterly relationship with the right individual          about the position          as a business analyst you will define document analyze communicate and collaborate the businesss needs to ensure that we are developing accurate products and services for both our internal and external customers this role will live within the project management team to liaise between all departments within the company the successful candidate will also take on the responsibility of documenting and maintaining a process library to provide clear communication across all departments this role requires strong interpersonal skills and writing skills to ensure clear communicationyou will work closely with many members of the wps team and provide exceptional support as needed your keen skills positivity strong work ethic and collaborative style will help wps continue to build our strong team          your responsibilities     work closely with the business units to define document and develop business requirements for our systems using standard templates and natural language     proactively communicate and analyze needs to the technical team to develop products for both internal and external customers define configuration specifications and business analysis requirements communicate key insights and findings to product team     drive and challenge business units on their assumptions of how they will successfully execute their plans     develop solution details such as data requirements descriptions use cases process maps data sourcing plans etc required to embed decisionmaking model into comprehensive business solutions     validate solution details with business users technology architects and application designers     prepare presentation materials     document and maintain all internal support processes within the company     define and monitor key performance indicators to measure success     perform quality assurance     prepare and document material for training purposes as needed          your experience          a minimum of 13 years of experience is preferred though not essential if you work diligently and learn quickly          the following skills and experience are required     bachelors degree computer science area a plus     strong written and verbal communication skills including technical writing skills     exceptional skills in the areas of organization prioritization attention to detail collaboration and multitasking under tight deadlines     proven experience in eliciting requirements and testing     basic knowledge in generating process documentation     interpersonal style that is professional confident easygoing and positive     ability to work autonomously and as part of a team     proficiency with microsoft office is required including powerpoint and visio     familiarity with sdlc a plus          our story          western psychological services wps was established in 1948 in a little pink house in brentwood not far from the local va hospital dr morse manson the company founder developed a psychological test that would help returning world war ii vets adjust to civilian life this was the first of many psychological and educational assessments that wps would publish over subsequent decades today these assessments are used by helping professionals throughout the world to evaluate diagnose and treat people in needespecially children and teens who have developmental social or behavioral challenges wps is known worldwide for our industryleading autism assessments          thats the first part of the story wps is a stable successful familyowned company 80 employees strong engaged in work that you can feel good about doing this is a place where you can build a careermany of our employees stick around for about scoop          scoop brings coworkers and neighbors together to enjoy a smooth carpooling experienceunlocking new opportunities to create friendships improve their wellbeing and make the most of their valuable time          business analytics  scoop     carpooling has been around for decades but its impact has been difficult to measure and understand at scoop we have a unique opportunity to use analytics to understand and showcase the impact of our carpooling community as a business analyst at scoop you will be responsible for helping answer fundamental strategic questions that influence how we sell market and expand you will partner crossfunctionally with product sales customer success and finance teams to provide visibility into our data make strategic recommendations and drive the successful growth of scoop every piece of data at scoop is tied to real human connection that happens between commuters nationwide and every insight you discover helps us connect more and more people together     in this role you will     actively generate insights and recommendations that influence business strategy at all stages sales launch and growth     partner with business function leads in building market health and customer management dashboards and reports that drive and expedite databacked decisions     deep dive into customer performance to identify opportunities to grow the scoop program     partner with data engineering to create scalable data processes and help evolve our internal analytics products     act like an owner  constantly strive to develop domain expertise and share it with others     you should have     an undergraduate degree in economics mathematics statistics computer science or a similar quantitative field or have equivalent additional work experience     2 years of work experience analyzing quantitative data     solid working knowledge of sql and comfort querying large datasets     experience with at least one scripting language used for data analysis eg r python     intellectual curiosity and aptitude to pick up new technical skills     the ability to clearly explain complicated analyses to nontechnical audiences and tell compelling concise stories with data     experience managing objectives and expectations with multiple stakeholders     expert ability to balance pressure for statistical rigor with timely business decisionmaking     you might also have     experience working closely with sales customer success andor finance teams     familiarity with using data visualization tools like periscope or tableau to display business trends and performance     predictive modeling experience using r or python     life  scoop          some easy math what do you get when you take a few bay area commuters a few cute office dogs and the idea of carpooling you get scoop the company that bring commuters together in carpools they love by partnering with their employers scoop unlocks new opportunities to make friendships improve your wellbeing and make the most of your valuable time          our team mixes technology and elbow grease every day with one statistic in our crosshairs 80 of americans drive alone to work wasting valuable minutes every morning a big problem sure but we know we can crack it through our talents partnerships and the scoop community thats already exploding          our culture is open and honest but considerate and respectful we lead with positive energy and bet on ourselves and scoop every day were defined by the moments we share showandtells company camping and eating way too many cookies we come from many backgrounds successful startups big tech companies and premier consulting firms but whether we walked into scoop with a tie or a tshirt were all united by a dream to change the way people get to work

executive summary     the sales forecasting and business analysis position is responsible for all forecasting activities associated with customers and products the sales forecasting business analyst creates and maintains forecast models for their customers ie sales finance supply chain  manufacturing incorporating business intelligence and forecast information gathered from customers sales marketing and finance          the sales forecasting business analyst is the integration point into the sales and commercial organization basic forecast modelling and rough cut capacity planning is the responsibility of this position this position leads the dialogue during the month in the sales and operations sop meeting for their respective customers and products with key counterparts in supply chain and operations     basic functions     develop demand forecasts at multiple levels of aggregation for multiple time horizons as part of a demand planning function     review historical sales trends research demand drivers cleanse and prepare forecast data develop statistical forecast models and evaluate forecast results     coordinate crossfunctional research activities to reconcile significant variances and refine the forecast model to reflect updated sales and marketing assumptions     interact with sales marketing and customer service to understand demand forecast drivers     utilize a collaborative and consensus approach by working with sales marketing and customer service to obtain and ensure that current and accurate information is used for demand forecasts     use and maintain the forecasting software     provide input to the supply chain organization in developing inventory strategies on existing items new products and product phaseouts     closely coordinate and communicate customer action plans with affected departments as it relates to capacity and supply planning          job functions     gather analyze and validate historical demand data through tsql queries     load resulting demand data into forecasting software to create statistical forecast     review statistical forecast model and apply error analysis techniques to improve forecasting     review sales plans customer supplied forecasts andor latest estimates and demand drivers provided to sales and customer service make override decisions to the statistical forecast based on these inputs     achieve consensus for operational demand forecasts by facilitating a collaborative planning process with sales marketing and finance personnel     maintain demand planning system and software including the entry and modification of data product hierarchy monitoring trends in forecast error and identifying relevant market related data and competitive intelligence     prepare and maintain relevant reports pertaining to demand planning process     key results     a demand forecast which incorporates current and accurate market information that allows the company to better react to marketplace requirements and provide its supply chain with the appropriate information necessary to meet market demand     improved synergy amongst supply chain sales marketing and finance which will lead to a better coordinated well informed and robust forecast to better guide the company refined systems and methods to continually improve forecasts so that the company can better anticipate market requirements     review supply plan monthly during the sop process to expose supply planners to the opportunities and risks associated with current production plan as it relates to specific customer requirements     position requirements     2 years experience in an analyst role in a business environment experience providing financial or analytical support to sales and customer service departments     experience with etldata cleansing     experience creating basic and customized reports utilizing tsql excel power query power pivot lookups etc     demonstrated proficiency in statistics forecasting and forecasting methods with an understanding of their financial and operational impacts     strong analytical organizational decision making and presentation skills     strong interpersonal communication skills are also essential to effectively interact with all teams areas and levels of business affecting the forecast process good facilitation skills are required along with the ability to present clearly to key stakeholders          preferred     forecastpro application experience     enterprise erp experience dynamics 365dynamics ax preferred     workflow  process documentation     power bi experience     powerapps  microsoft flow experience     educationtraining     babs college degree in business finance statistics or related field equivalent experience accepted mba preferred     licensescertificates     apics or other forecasting certification preferred     physical demands the physical demands described here are representative of those that must be continued to grow organically and through acquisition in april 2013 a majority stake in the company was sold to elior a french based contract caterer elior launched an ipo on the french stock exchange in june 2014 and is now publicly traded          in 2015 elior north america implemented a strategy to centralize certain accounting functions in a shared services department located in jackson ms payroll currently processes weekly payroll checks for approximately 8000 employees across eight companies conversion projects to centralize processing for additional companies are scheduled through 2018 and will add an additional 2000 employees however elior north america continues to evaluate acquisition opportunities meaning that future conversions are likely          elior north america shared services operates in a dynamic environment delivering accounts payable general accounting payroll revenue recognition and treasury services we endeavor to serve our internal and external customers through the application of technology and proven best practices mixed with innovative thinking          position summary     the business analyst will be responsible for supporting the
